header.brandAlt: Crane logo with the text: Beneath the Surface
header.blurb: We exist to call and equip God's people to pray for spiritual breakthrough in Japan.

response.title: Responding in prayer
response.blurb0: We invite you to listen to a local believer pray for this topic and to respond with your own prayer to God.
response.blurb1: We also invite you to share the prayer points with others, or to send us your reflections using the form below.
response.feedbackTextPlaceholder: Write your reflections or prayer insights here. We'd love to hear from you.
